name: One of many (yadvashem)
description:
ONE OF MANY

A visual novel made by the German and Israeli students, this game was made in order to bring Dawid's diary closer to people as well as give it the recognition it deserves. In his diary he talkes about the things he had to go through and even if some pages were burnt, his story is still one that should be heard. 

This was only made for educational purposes and we sticked as much as possible to the original diary. Generally, the project 'Reading Together' was there to create a strong bond between the Israeli and German students of this project.

Us students are glad that we got the opportunity to try something out of the box and present it to the world while connecting with amazing people.

This game was made by Group 2 (Dilek Serin, Victoria Neimann, Valentin Nerb, Yael Kolyoav, Yael Toren).
